forum.content:
hey girls,
I live in TAICHUNG and work at foreign bike company.
Usually running or playing basketball with my coworkers after work. Love cooking~

It's hard to find girls because lots of MAN around my working place...shxt!!!! haha.
I am an outgoing, easygoing person and kindness to old peoples.
I hope you are serious with me, no more kidding and cheating.

keywords as followed:
Mar, 1986; 180cm; single; smile like sunshine; sport; gentle with female.
forum.title: Serious relationship
